name: One Bullet (Timbelion)
description:
A game made in 7 days for Brackeys game jam. Destroy as many asteroids as you can and make as much mess as possible. Game was made using C++ and SFML.

Rules

You start with just one bullet and you have 30 seconds to destroy as many asteroids as you can. You gain one bullet every time you destroy an asteroid. You can die by crashing into asteroid or by running out of bullets. Good luck!

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • LEFT mouse button to shot
